title: 403_forbidden: MCL-ACM Horror Event
description: October 17, 2022 - In celebration of Halloween, MCL-ACM organized an online horror event called "403 forbidden." The event was open to all MCL students and took place on the MCL-ACM Discord server. The students formed teams to solve the escape roomâ€™s puzzles, which tested their critical thinking and problem-solving skills. Prizes were given to the top two teams with the most points.
summary: In celebration of Halloween, MCL-ACM organized an online horror event called "403 forbidden."
